title: Language Support
description: How well does the model perform in your specific programming language and framework?

title: Problem-Solving Ability
description: Can the model understand and solve complex algorithmic challenges, not just generate simple snippets?

title: Debugging Skills
description: When given a piece of buggy code and an error message, can the model identify the issue and suggest a correct fix?

title: Contextual Awareness
description: Does the model understand the broader context of your project to provide relevant and consistent suggestions?
